label_serial_baudrate: Baudrate of Serial Port (standard with Wifi 921600)
label_serial_update_intervall: Update Interval for Serial Port Data Stream (seconds)
label_use_html: Use HTML polling of Raw Data
label_use_pv2: Read PV2 Data (SBMS60, SBMS100 & SBMS120 only)
label_use_temp_ext: Read External Temperature (requires connected temperature sensor)
label_debug: Enable Debug messages (Adapter log will be very full!)
